nodes.text: A Sound Storybook Adventure is a canon young-readers book in the Play-a-Sound series that adapts the Star Wars original trilogy with read-along sound effects. It was published by Phoenix International Publications, Inc. in November 2015.
Join Luke, Han Solo, Obi-Wan, and Leia on 3 galaxy-saving missions as you press 8 buttons to hear sounds and voices from the movie.
